channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Huhu
channel.desc: Huhu2 is a fun and light hearted puppet series for tamariki where an inquisitive and chatty book grub reads te reo Maori books with his friend, Pai. Featuring stories from foremost childrens publisher Scholastic, by prolific writers such as Joy Cowley, Kyle Mewburn, Ruth Paul, Tim Tipene and Gavin Bishop.
